oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bill Western Job No. 38900
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm); Smith, Connie, 1941-;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 3435) for an order placed by Bill Western for 75 two color window cards for a performance by Connie Smith at the Rio Palm Isle in Longview, Texas on October 11, 75 two color window cards for a performance by Connie Smith at Geneva Hall in Elm Mott, Texas on October 12, 50 two color window cards for a performance by Connie Smith at the Wagon Wheel Inn on October 14, and 100 two color window cards for a performance by Connie Smith on October 16. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
